name: Chrono Gunner
description:
My submission for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2

How to play:

WASD - move

Use mouse to look around

lmb - shoot

space - rewind time

R - reload

Try to survive as long as you can. After every round there will be a shop to upgrade your stats. But be careful, the rounds get longer after each round.

Have fun.
